name: Daily Delivery
description: Help the postal service deliver important
packages and messages around the village.

objectives.collect_packages: Collect 8 Packages from the Post Office

dialogs.start1: Thanks for volunteering for delivery duty!
dialogs.start2: These packages and letters need to reach their destinations today.
dialogs.start3: The village depends on reliable delivery service.
dialogs.progress1: Great work! The recipients are very grateful.
dialogs.progress2: You're making excellent time on your route.
dialogs.complete2: The village stays connected thanks to people like you.
